resources.exception_create_shelf_default_cause_tex: The server made a mistake! It may be down. Try again later.
resources.lp_contribute_banner_text: Shoot your shot. Submit a story. Win some merch.
resources.lp_subtext_block: A collection of fictional stories about the absurd.
resources.lp_sub_banner_text_shard_2: in its endeavor to continue writing and existing.
resources.story_micro_banner_text: Get updates for when new stories are released from your favorite authors
resources.lp_shelf_banner_text_shard_2: and stake your place in the couchverse.
resources.contribute__description_shard_1: Couch Gag is a community driven project. It's a collection of unique voices from our community. If you'd like to submit a story, please
resources.contribute__description_shard_2: which will contain all the latest details on submission, document formatting, and response time.
resources.contribute__description_download_string: download and read our "Couch Gag Extended Submission Guide"
resources.contribute__dropfile: Drop Or Click To Upload Your Files
resources.contribute__error_text: Something went wrong while trying to upload your file. Try refreshing the page and trying again, or waiting a short time before trying again.
resources.contribute__file_uploaded: Nice! Your submission went through! Your submission id is
resources.contribute__file-uploaded-subtext: If your story is selected, we'll reach out to you in 5-10 business days with next steps for publishing.
